column4: i'd like to apt build-essential  but synaptics want me to insert the installation CD :( why is that so?
you need to remove the cdrom references from /etc/apt/sources.list
do you also happen to know if it's possible to downgrade gutsy to feisty?
no, I'm sorry I don't know about that. If your /home is on another partition, then its easy.
easy? you mean I could just backup the partition and install feisty?
feisty doesn't work on my new laptop due to unsupported HW
i'm unable to run the installer
i have a new graphical card which is not supported in feisty so it doesn't start X
so i tried with the alternate cd
that's strange .. what card is it?
and, i can't use the keyboard therfe
